title: Docker daemon not running
body: If you see: Cannot connect to the Docker daemon, it usually means Docker Desktop is not running. Start Docker Desktop, then retry docker compose up -d --build. On Linux, ensure the docker service is running and your user is in the docker group.

title: chmod: Operation not permitted inside container
body: Sometimes docker build fails with chmod: changing permissions of '/entrypoint.sh': Operation not permitted. A common fix is to set permissions at copy time using COPY --chmod=755 entrypoint.sh /entrypoint.sh (or COPY --chown=...). This avoids running chmod in a layer where the filesystem forbids it.

title: Heredoc stuck (heredoc>) in zsh
body: If your terminal shows heredoc> it means the shell is waiting for the terminator word. Press Ctrl+C to cancel, or type the terminator (for example JSON) on its own line to finish the heredoc.

title: Vector DB debugging checklist
body: To debug retrieval, log request_id, filters, embedding model and dimension, vector norm, ANN target hits, ranking profile, and returned doc ids. Always decide if the failure is recall (not retrieved) or ranking (retrieved but ordered wrong).

title: Tenant t2: Docker tips
body: This document belongs to tenant t2. It mentions docker and daemon issues but should not appear when searching with tenant_id=t1.

title: Cooking notes (noise)
body: This is unrelated content about cooking pasta and sauces. It exists to make retrieval harder and to show that filters and ranking matter.

title:
## Compose errors
## Missing contexts
## Fixes
body:
## Missing build contexts
If docker compose says a build context path was not found, create the missing folder or fix the path in docker-compose.yml.

## Services XML distribution-key
If Vespa says node missing required attribute distribution-key, add distribution-key="0" to the node in services.xml.

## HNSW schema syntax
If schema parsing fails around hnsw, ensure hnsw block is inside index { ... } and embedding field has indexing: attribute | index.
